name: BEBERES
description:
Beberes is a local coop game played by 2 players.

the players are assigned to arrange the items in accordance with the photos given at the beginning of the game.
The photo is shown in just a few seconds. You must remember its position.

Pick up , move and drop object to its position.

Synchronous movements between players are needed to make it easier to win this game.

Have a nice play

Feedback is welcome..

HOW TO PLAY

Player 1  use WASD to move and hold LSHIFT to PICKUP and release it to DROP

Player 2  use ARROW to move and hold RCTRL to PICKUP and releaseit  to DROP

This game is a prototype that was made for  3days idgs gamejam #funfromhome and only have 3 level.

if you like it, please  like on facebook post page with beberes picture : https://bit.ly/3ffH9Nk
